text: Jonathan Scott Frakes (born August 19, 1952) is an American actor and director. Frakes played Commander William T. Riker in the television series Star Trek: The Next Generation and movies. He was the voice for David Xanatos in the Disney television series Gargoyles. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Jonathan Frakes profile at NNDB * Jonathan Frakes in-depth interview at Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television directors Category:Movie directors from Pennsylvania Category:Actors from Bethlehem, Pennsylvania
title: Jonathan Frakes
